item.title: The PNPLA3-I148M variant increases polyunsaturated triglycerides in human adipose tissue

item.title: Human PNPLA3-I148M variant increases hepatic retention of polyunsaturated fatty acids
Saturated Fat Is More Metabolically Harmful for the Human Liver Than Unsaturated Fat or Simple Sugars
